summary: In the last days of World War II, a group of Nazis and their sympathizers try to escape from reckoning using a submarine.
cast: Marcel Dalio|Henri Vidal|Florence Marly|Fosco Giachetti|Paul Bernard|Jo Dest|Michel Auclair|Anne Campion|Andreas von Halberstadt|Jean Didier|Lucien Hector|Jean Lozach|Karl Münch|Georges Niemann|Max Herman|Claude Vernier|Pierre Fuchs|Carrère|Jeanne Herviale|Kurt Kronefeld|Paul Sabas|Michel Thierry
keywords: year 1945|france|royan france|city in ruins|first person narration
title: Los malditos
